title: Abandoned Cyber-Zoo Adventure #6
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Security Control Room
rooms.description: A dimly lit control room with flickering holographic displays showing empty zoo enclosures. Dust covers the consoles, and sparking wires hang from the ceiling. Through the reinforced window, you can see the abandoned exhibits bathed in emergency lighting. The air smells of ozone and decay.

items.name: main security console
items.description: A large console with multiple compartments and a cracked display screen

items.name: security incident log
items.description: A digital tablet with the last security entries
items.text: FINAL ENTRY - Day 2157: All systems failing. The cyber animals have gone dormant. Director Chen ordered evacuation. Remember: The zoo opened with three original exhibits - the Apex Predator in the Habitat Dome, the Aquatic Wonder in the Marine Tank, and the Sky Dancer in the Aviary.

items.name: security access keycard
items.description: A magnetic keycard labeled 'EXHIBIT ACCESS - AUTHORIZED PERSONNEL ONLY'

items.name: emergency supply locker
items.description: A metal locker with emergency equipment

items.name: electronic maintenance tool
items.description: A multi-purpose tool for repairing electronic locks and panels

items.name: cracked wall monitor
items.description: A damaged screen still displaying some information
items.text: ZOO DIRECTORY: Habitat Dome (Cyber Tiger Exhibit) - East Wing. Marine Observatory - North Wing. Aviary Complex - West Wing. Shuttle Bay - Restricted Access via Habitat Dome.

items.name: exhibit hall access door
items.description: A reinforced door leading to the main exhibit area. The card reader blinks red.

rooms.name: Cyber Habitat Dome
rooms.description: A massive domed enclosure designed to simulate a jungle environment. Artificial trees with fiber optic leaves cast strange shadows. In the center, a deactivated cyber tiger lies dormant on a rock formation, its metallic fur dulled with age. Holographic butterflies flicker in and out of existence. Information kiosks line the walkway.

items.name: cyber tiger display
items.description: A magnificent robotic tiger, now powered down. A maintenance panel is visible on its side.

items.name: glowing power core fragment
items.description: A piece of advanced technology that still pulses with energy

items.name: interactive information kiosk
items.description: A touch screen display with zoo information
items.text: CYBER TIGER EXHIBIT: Our apex predator! Designed by Dr. Sarah Chen in 2157. This magnificent creature represents the pinnacle of bio-mechanical engineering. Fun fact: Tigers are known as apex predators in their natural habitat!

items.name: exhibit storage cabinet
items.description: A locked cabinet containing exhibit maintenance supplies

items.name: director's personal note
items.description: A handwritten note from Director Chen
items.text: Personal reminder: Shuttle bay access requires security clearance. Questions are: Who designed the cyber animals? What year did we open? What type of predator is the tiger? The shuttle key is in this cabinet. - Director Sarah Chen

items.name: shuttle bay key
items.description: A physical key labeled 'EMERGENCY SHUTTLE BAY'

items.name: elevated observation deck
items.description: A raised platform with a better view of the exhibit

items.name: zoo visitor guide
items.description: A promotional brochure for the cyber zoo
items.text: Welcome to the Cyber-Zoo! Opened in 2157 by visionary Director Dr. Sarah Chen. Experience the future of wildlife preservation through advanced robotics and AI. Our exhibits feature the most realistic cyber animals ever created!

items.name: shuttle bay access door
items.description: A heavy security door with a biometric scanner and question panel. A sign reads 'EMERGENCY EVACUATION ROUTE'.

password_questions.question: Who designed the cyber animals?
password_questions.hint: Check the information kiosk and visitor materials

password_questions.question: What year did the zoo open?
password_questions.hint: The security log and visitor guide both mention this

password_questions.question: What type of predator is the tiger?
password_questions.hint: Read the information kiosk about the cyber tiger

rooms.name: Emergency Shuttle Bay
rooms.description: You've made it to the evacuation point! A sleek emergency shuttle sits on the launch pad, its engines humming to life as you approach. The bay doors are open to the sky, showing stars beyond. Control panels glow with ready status indicators. Freedom is just a launch sequence away.

items.name: emergency evacuation shuttle
items.description: A compact spacecraft designed for emergency evacuations, fully fueled and ready to launch

items.name: shuttle launch console
items.description: The control panel shows all systems green and ready for departure

items.name: observation window
items.description: A large window showing the launch pad and the open sky beyond

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You board the emergency shuttle and initiate the launch sequence. The engines roar to life as the shuttle lifts off from the abandoned cyber-zoo. Through the window, you watch the derelict facility shrink below you as you escape to safety. The cyber animals will sleep forever, but you are free! You win!
